data.title: Dani Alves' message for Sergio Ramos after Raul Garcia incident
data.meta_description: Dani Alves couldn't help but wade into the controversial debates that arose from Sunday's matches in LaLiga Santander.In the first of the...
data.text:
Dani Alves couldn't help but wade into the controversial debates that arose from Sunday's matches in LaLiga Santander.

In the first of the day's games, Athletic Club were denied a penalty against Real Madrid after Sergio Ramos trod on Raul Garcia in the box.

"One day they taught us that we had to do much more than what we do or it won't reach us, and that's how it was," former Barcelona right-back Alves said on Twitter.
